name: Chicken Squash Soup
description: Indulge in the savory delight of our Chicken Squash Soup, a heartwarming blend that embodies health and taste. Perfect for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb meal, this soup promises a nutritional boost with low sugar content and the wholesome goodness of ingredients like pumpkin and Moringa Oleifera leaves. A treasure trove for anyone on a health journey, especially tailored for those following a healthy lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Cut the chicken into small pieces; dice the red onion; mince the garlic; peel and grate the fresh turmeric root; wash and chop the Moringa Oleifera leaves; cube the pumpkin.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, combine the chicken, red onion, garlic, salt, pepper, and grated turmeric root. Add enough water to cover the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce to a simmer, cooking for 20 minutes until the chicken is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cubed pumpkin to the pot and simmer for another 10 minutes until the pumpkin is soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Moringa Oleifera leaves and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust seasoning with more salt and pepper if needed. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
